wikipedia_page.main: Beatrice Frederika Wright, Lady Wright MBE, née Clough, later Rathbone (17 June 1910 – 17 March 2003) was an American-born British politician.

response: ** Beatrice Wright, Lady Wright, American-born politician (born 1910)
*Beatrice Wright, 92, American-British politician (Member of Parliament of the U.K. for Bodmin).
